plays.text: Penalty to Brian Rafalski 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Steve Webb

Goal scored by Kenny Jonsson assisted by Alexei Yashin and Oleg Kvasha

Goal scored by Michael Peca assisted by Mark Parrish
Penalty to DICK TARNSTROM 2 minutes for Holding Randy McKay
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Interference Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Brad Isbister 2 minutes for Roughing Turner Stevenson
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Isbister
Penalty to Adrian Aucoin 2 minutes for Holding Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Scott Niedermayer assisted by Scott Gomez and Bobby Holik
